DOC.brief_title: The Glycaemic Effect Isomaltulose Consumption Healthy Participants
DOC.detailed_description: The objective present study investigate glycaemic effect isomaltulose Chinese , Indians , Malays Caucasians . This single intervention . Up fifty participant , consist least ten Chinese , ten Malays , ten Indians , ten Caucasians complete data set , age 21 40 year recruit general public Singapore . Participants ask attend two test session study . Participants consume either sucrose drink isomaltulose drink ( contain 50 g available carbohydrate ) .
